author: Sarah Perez
title: Target pauses plans for grocery pickup amid COVID-19 outbreak
description: Target is pausing its plans to offer curbside pick-up of groceries and alcoholic beverages, citing the COVID-19 outbreak as the key factor in its decision to delay the launch. Although groceries via Order Pickup and Drive Up would be valuable services at a ti…
